reg_info.act_under: Fairness for Parents and Employees Act (Teachers’ Withdrawal of Services), 1997

content.content: 1. The deadline for the purposes of subsections 3 (5) and (10) of the Act is February 6, 1998. O. Reg. 13/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The deadline for the purposes of subsections 3 (5) and (10) of the Act is February 6, 1998. O. Reg. 13/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 13/98, s. 2. Français
